benefits.title: Live your best life
benefits.description: Hire skilled part-time professionals flexibly and cost-effectively with our seamless outsourcing solutions.

hero.top_paragraph:
Flexible Talent, On-Demand
Providing skilled part-time professionals through seamless outsourcing solutions tailored to your business needs.
hero.bottom_paragraph: We specialize in providing businesses with highly skilled part-time professionals through seamless outsourcing solutions. Our flexible workforce ensures you get the right talent when you need it, without long-term commitments. Whether you require temporary support or project-based expertise, we help you scale efficiently and cost-effectively.

how-it-works.description:
Choose Flexibility Without Compromise: We connect you with top part-time professionals—quickly, reliably, and without the hassle of long-term contracts.

We Manage, You Scale: From hiring and onboarding to payroll and compliance, we handle operations so you can focus on growing your business.

benefits.title: Dedicated Talent. Zero Overhead.
benefits.description: Build your team with full-time professionals, fully managed and integrated into your operation.

hero.top_paragraph:
Your Team, Our Responsibility
Hire full-time professionals through our seamless outsourcing model.
hero.bottom_paragraph: We empower companies to grow confidently by providing full-time professionals who integrate into your team and culture. You get the commitment of in-house talent — with none of the administrative burden.

how-it-works.description: We handle the full employee lifecycle: recruitment, onboarding, legal compliance, payroll, and performance tracking. You focus on results — we handle the rest.

benefits.title: Operational HR, Expertly Managed
benefits.description: Outsource your day-to-day HR operations and stay focused on your core business.

hero.top_paragraph:
Reliable HR Support
Let our team manage your HR operations while you grow your business.
hero.bottom_paragraph: We support companies by running their HR operations — from onboarding and employee records to contracts, payroll inputs, and compliance reporting. Our experts ensure your internal processes stay efficient, legal, and employee-friendly.

how-it-works.description: Our approach includes assessing your current HR workflows, identifying gaps, and implementing better systems and tools. You get a trusted HR partner without needing to build an in-house team.

benefits.title: Build Winning Teams
benefits.description: Leverage our tech-enabled recruitment solutions to access qualified, culturally-aligned talent tailored to your growth goals.

hero.top_paragraph:
Tech-driven. People-first. Culture-aligned.
We connect you with talent that fuels your success.
hero.bottom_paragraph: At Reference Agency, we combine deep industry insight with AI-powered tools and human expertise to help you hire the right people — faster. From tech startups to enterprise teams, we tailor each recruitment journey to meet your culture, structure, and vision.

how-it-works.description: Our proven process blends smart sourcing, precise assessment, and personalized support — helping you hire top talent with confidence and speed.

benefits.title: Smart People Governance
benefits.description: Get tailored HR strategies and expert support to build scalable systems aligned with your company’s growth and market dynamics.

hero.top_paragraph:
Strategic Insight. Executable Systems.
We co-create HR solutions that fuel growth and empower your people.
hero.bottom_paragraph: At Reference Agency, we help you build a strong foundation for HR — from grading frameworks and performance systems to culture and compliance. Our consulting is grounded in deep understanding of your business, your people, and your local market. We deliver clarity, structure, and results.

how-it-works.description: We begin with focused discovery sessions to understand your current HR environment. Then we co-develop a practical roadmap covering strategy, policy, and structure — and guide you step-by-step through implementation to ensure real, lasting impact.
